title: Juan Pedro Lanzani
summary: Juan Pedro Lanzani (born 24 August 1990), most known as Peter Lanzani, is an Argentine actor and singer and former child model. He is best known for his role on the Cris Morena television series Casi Ángeles playing Thiago Bedoya Agüero, and as a member of the music group Teen Angels. He is also known for his roles in Argentina 1985 by Santiago Mitre and El Clan by Pablo Trapero.
